name: Compromised Shield
desc: This ship's shields have been disabled, leaving it vulnerable to all forms of direct attacks. It is typically the result of damage sustained to the shield emitters or modifications to other critical ship systems. Or perhaps both, in this case.

name: Pirate Modifications
desc:
This hull has undergone significant modifications, it's pirate crew prioritizing showy weapon systems and high-speed engines over frivolous things like "reliability", "Hull Integrity", and "Flux Capacity".


Increased chance of malfunctions. Hull and Armor reduced by %s, Flux Capacity reduced by %s, Flux Dissipation increased by %s.
sModDesc:
Leaning further into these eccentric hull changes grants bonuses at the furthered expense of reliability.

Hull and Armor penalty further increased to %s. Flux Capacity penalty further increased to %s, Flux Dissipation bonus further increased to %s. Increases max speed by %s.

%s weapon damage increased by %s.

%s weapon flux generation reduced by %s, and rate of fire increased by %s.

name: Weaponized Flux Core
desc: This ships energy grid has been retrofitted for combat-ready flux manipulation. The "Fluxcore", after charging to %s flux, fires continuous energy arcs at nearby ships dealing %s damage %s damage at a rate scaled by current flux level. Upon reaching %s flux the core will go critical, firing at an increased rate but also striking the home ship with arcs dealing %s damage %s damage.

name: Heavy Missile Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of large missile weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of large missile weapons.

name: Heavy Universal Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of large weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of large weapons.

name: Duel Flux Grid
desc: This ship boasts a confusing duel flux grid allowing independent operation of offensive and defensive systems. The unrefined nature of this flux handling method is prone to backfires and meltdowns.

name: Limited Energy Grid
desc: Disables ship permanetly if flux cap is reached

name: Cargo Convert
desc: Way to reduce cargo on .skin ships

desc: An experimental power armor plate made to counter beam weaponry.
